mapper.select: SELECT A.* FROM TBL_USER A WHERE A.USER_ID = #{userId} AND A.USER_PWD = #{userPwd} AND A.USER_ACTIVE = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_USER A ( A.USER_NAME, A.USER_ID, A.USER_PWD, A.USER_TEL, A.USER_EMAIL, A.ADDRESS, A.USER_ROLE, A.USER_ACTIVE, A.USER_ENTDATE, A.USER_POINT ) VALUES ( #{userName}, #{userId}, #{userPwd}, #{userTel}, #{userEmail}, #{userAddr}, 'USER', 'Y', SYSDATE, 1000 )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_USER A WHERE A.USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_USER A SET A.USER_NAME = #{userName}, A.USER_PWD = #{userPwd}, A.USER_TEL = #{userTel}, A.USER_EMAIL = #{userEmail}, A.ADDRESS = #{userAddr}, WHERE A.USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.delete: DELETE * FROM TBL_USER A WHERE A.USER_ID = #{userId}
